pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tracking Data // Access and manipulate spatial tracking data, with straightforward coercion from and to other formats. Filter for speed and create time spent maps from tracking data. There are coercion methods to convert between 'trip' and 'ltraj' from 'adehabitatLT', and between 'trip' and 'psp' and 'ppp' from 'spatstat'. Trip objects can be created from raw or grouped data frames, and from types in the 'sp', sf', 'amt', 'trackeR', 'mousetrap', and other packages, Sumner, MD (2011) https://eprints.utas.edu.au/12273/3/sumner.pdf.
